title: Web Shop for Icons
description: A fully functional online store for selling icons, featuring an admin panel to add, edit, and delete products, manage orders and contact submissions. Includes a product gallery for direct purchase, a gallery of sample designs available for order, a contact page, and an "About Us" page.

title: Web Shop - Example
description: A demo online shop with an admin panel for managing products, including adding, editing, and deleting items, as well as viewing customer inquiries and orders. The store features a product listing with an option to add items to the cart and place an order.

title: Portfolio
description: My personal portfolio showcasing projects and the technologies I work with. Includes a contact form for direct email communication and an "About Me" page sharing my professional journey
